t: Crib brand review: Pali - Baby Bargains
s: March 22, 2020 - We should note these customer service issues are scattered—while we see complaints on Amazon (from several years ago), customer reviews on WayFair (as well as our own readers) are more positive on Pali. Bottom line: Pali is a good, mid-price brand that offers a dash of European design flair ...
